Define_overdrive_EventCounter_type
[Constants and Definitions]


Defines

#define ADL_ODN_EVENTCOUNTER_THERMAL   0
#define ADL_ODN_EVENTCOUNTER_VPURECOVERY   1

Detailed Description

These defines the EventCounter type being reported. It is used by ADL2_OverdriveN_CountOfEvents_Get ,can be used on older OD version supported ASICs also.

Define Documentation

#define ADL_ODN_EVENTCOUNTER_THERMAL   0

#define ADL_ODN_EVENTCOUNTER_VPURECOVERY   1
